org.dspace.discovery
Class DiscoverQuery

java.lang.Object
  org.dspace.discovery.DiscoverQuery

public class DiscoverQuery
extends Object

This class represents a query which the discovery backend can use

Author:
Kevin Van de Velde (kevin at atmire dot com)
